errors.error_description: The instructions force the installation of `Pykka==1.2.1`, an outdated version that is incompatible with the current version of Mopidy and will cause dependency conflicts or runtime errors.
correction_candidates: Remove the line `pip install Pykka==1.2.1`, as the correct version is specified by the project's own dependencies.
Change `pip install Pykka==1.2.1` to `pip install -U Pykka` to get the latest version.
Look up the correct version of Pykka in `setup.cfg` and update the command accordingly.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `pip install Pykka==1.2.1`, as the correct version is specified by the project's own dependencies.
